### **Introduction**

In this pre-course exercise, you will:

- Download and manage spatial environmental data.

### **Getting Started**

You will use the following packages

  - Climate variables
    - Manual downloads:
      - [Chelsa](https://chelsa-climate.org/)
      - [WorldClim](https://www.worldclim.org/)
    - Automated downloads in R:
      - [raster](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/raster/raster.pdf)
      - [climatedata](https://github.com/MirzaCengic/climatedata)
      - [chelsaDL](https://github.com/matthewkling/chelsaDL)
      - [climateR](https://github.com/mikejohnson51/climateR)
  
  - Other
    - Elevation (STRM)
    - Land-use
    - Soil
      - HWSD


```{r}
library(rgbif)
library(CoordinateCleaner)
```
